title: Plat team LF Toplaner
body:
We currently have plat level players in all positions and are looking for a meta toplaner to start for our team. We are looking to be a serious team with practices and scrims.

IGN:
Rank:
Champions:
Op.GG:
Shotcalling?:

replies.body:
IGN: God Of Tea
Rank:p4/d4 last season
Champions: Fiora,Riven,Naut, irelia, aatrox, jayce, gp, rene, willing to learn any trying to transition to top lane
Op.GG:
Shotcalling: yes
